title: 4.2 Master Challenge 3
question:
Create a Pizza class and follow the instructions below:
1. Add three instance variables: type, toppings, and size.
2. Add a constructor with the method signature: Pizza(String theType, String theToppings, int theSize)
3. Create three objects of the Pizza class: pizza1, pizza2, pizza3 using constructor.

Also, print the values of all three objects. For example, your program might print:
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
